title: Lord Solange Lovakengj

properties.name: description
properties.value: Lord Solange Lovakengj was the leader of the Lovakengj House at the time of the signing of the royal accord of twill and advised its creation.[1]

content:
Lord Solange Lovakengj was the leader of the Lovakengj House at the time of the signing of the royal accord of twill and advised its creation.[1]

Predecessor Title Successor
Unknown Leader of Lovakengj Eventually Lord Lovakengj I

References[edit | edit source]

  1. ^ Royal accord of twill, Old School RuneScape. "at the advice of Ethrain Hosidius, Seabry Shayzien, Ret Piscarilius, Solange Lovakengj and Bourath Arceuus all royal Lords of our kingdom."
